description: Rewrite of the 04_AC.pushbutton plugin from scratch. The plugin places sockets for air conditioners in rooms adjacent to external AC baskets.

userStories.title: Clean and Setup Plugin Structure
userStories.description: Delete all existing files in '04_AC.pushbutton' and create a fresh plugin structure (bundle.yaml, script.py, lib folder).
userStories.notes: Deleted old files and created bundle.yaml and script.py.

userStories.title: Implement AC Basket Collector
userStories.description: Create logic to find all AC outdoor unit baskets in the model. Need to identify the correct Family/Type names for baskets.
acceptanceCriteria: Function to collect AC Basket elements.
Filter by Category (likely Mechanical Equipment or Generic Models) and Name keywords.

userStories.title: Implement Adjacency Logic (Basket -> Room)
userStories.description: For each basket, find the adjacent internal room. Since baskets are outside, we need to find the room on the other side of the wall or the closest room.
acceptanceCriteria: Identify the wall the basket is attached to (Host).
Get the room connected to that wall.
Fallback: Spatial proximity search if not hosted.

userStories.title: Implement Socket Placement Logic
userStories.description: Place one socket in the identified room. Calculate Z = (Room Ceiling Height - 300mm).
acceptanceCriteria: Place FamilyInstance (Socket) at a valid location on the wall (aligned with basket if possible, or center of wall).
